scripts.i: concurrently "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && set PORT=5000 && react-scripts start"
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && set PORT=5000 && react-scripts start"
scripts.build: concurrently "cd server && npm build" "cd client && react-scripts build"
